ISSUE.TITLE: Option to switch off bolus amount outputs
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.** With the new "automatic bolus" feature currently available to test in Loop, the number of micro boluses can make the chart in NS very hard to read, as shown in this screenshot. **Describe the solution you'd like** Have an option to switch off the output of bolus values on the charge so you only see the bolus circle and have to hover over it to see the bolus amount. **Additional context** Relates to: - https://github.com/LoopKit/Loop/tree/automatic-bolus - https://github.com/LoopKit/Loop/pull/1219
